name: Command Aviation
about: Command Aviation, operating out of Bellingham International Airport, is a full-service aviation facility offering exceptional flight training and maintenance services. Since 2009, our experienced team of flight instructors has been helping students obtain pilot certificates, add-on ratings, and complete endorsements for technically advanced aircraft. We also provide aircraft rentals and biannual flight reviews. Our maintenance department, staffed by A&P/IA mechanics, handles annual inspections, avionics installations, and other repair services. Dedicated to excellence in aviation, Command Aviation is the go-to choice for the Pacific Northwest aviation community, ensuring top-notch training and maintenance for all your aviation needs.
services:
